mapper.sql: select * from (SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UESRROLENAME AS UESRROLENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, (select t.orgname from v_orguser t where t.ORGUSERID = t1.USEROBJECTID) AS USERDATA, (select t2.porgname from v_ormorg t2 where exists(select 1 from t_srforguser t where t.orgid = t2.orgid and t.orguserid = t1.USEROBJECTID)) as USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t1.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USERROLEDETAILID, t1.USERROLEDETAILNAME, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERTAG FROM v_USERROLEDETAIL t1 ) t1 WHERE ( ( exists(select 1 from t_srforguser t2 left join t_srforg t3 on t3.orgid = t2.orgid where t2.orguserid = t1.userobjectid and ( instr(t3.levelcode, ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} ) )=1 ) ) OR exists(select 1 from t_srfuserroledetail t2 where t2.userroleid = '32A40E9C-9BC9-41AD-ACDD-DCE44CB4B16C' and t2.userobjectid =#{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) OR 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.userid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')} and rownum = 1) ) )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t11.USERROLENAME AS UESRROLENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t21.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USERROLEDETAILID, t1.USERROLEDETAILNAME, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERTAG FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t11 ON t1.USERROLEID = t11.USERROLEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t21.`USERROLENAME` AS `UESRROLENAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USEROBJECTID`, t11.`USEROBJECTNAME`, t1.`USERROLEDETAILID`, t1.`USERROLEDETAILNAME`, t1.`USERROLEID`, t1.`USERTAG` FROM `T_SRFUSERROLEDETAIL` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t11.USEROBJECTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t21 ON t1.USERROLEID = t21.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t21.USERROLENAME AS UESRROLENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t11.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USERROLEDETAILID, t1.USERROLEDETAILNAME, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERTAG FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t11.USEROBJECTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t21 ON t1.USERROLEID = t21.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t11.USERROLENAME AS UESRROLENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID AS USEROBJECTID, t21.USEROBJECTNAME AS USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USERROLEDETAILID AS USERROLEDETAILID, t1.USERROLEDETAILNAME AS USERROLEDETAILNAME, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t1.USERTAG AS USERTAG FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t11 ON t1.USERROLEID = t11.USERROLEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t11.USERROLENAME AS UESRROLENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID AS USEROBJECTID, t21.USEROBJECTNAME AS USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USERROLEDETAILID AS USERROLEDETAILID, t1.USERROLEDETAILNAME AS USERROLEDETAILNAME, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t1.USERTAG AS USERTAG FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t11 ON t1.USERROLEID = t11.USERROLEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t11.[USERROLENAME] AS [UESRROLENAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDATA], t1.[USERDATA2], t1.[USEROBJECTID], t21.[USEROBJECTNAME], t1.[USERROLEDETAILID], t1.[USERROLEDETAILNAME], t1.[USERROLEID], t1.[USERTAG] FROM [T_SRFUSERROLEDETAIL] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t11 ON t1.USERROLEID = t11.USERROLEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID

select * from (SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UESRROLENAME AS UESRROLENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, (select t.orgname from v_orguser t where t.ORGUSERID = t1.USEROBJECTID) AS USERDATA, (select t2.porgname from v_ormorg t2 where exists(select 1 from t_srforguser t where t.orgid = t2.orgid and t.orguserid = t1.USEROBJECTID)) as USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t1.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USERROLEDETAILID, t1.USERROLEDETAILNAME, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERTAG FROM v_USERROLEDETAIL t1 ) t1 WHERE ( exists(select 1 from t_srfuserroledetail t2 where t2.userroledetailid=t1.userroledetailid and t2.userobjectid =#{srf.datacontext.ORGUSERID')}) )

select * from (SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UESRROLENAME AS UESRROLENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, (select t.orgname from v_orguser t where t.ORGUSERID = t1.USEROBJECTID) AS USERDATA, (select t2.porgname from v_ormorg t2 where exists(select 1 from t_srforguser t where t.orgid = t2.orgid and t.orguserid = t1.USEROBJECTID)) as USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t1.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USERROLEDETAILID, t1.USERROLEDETAILNAME, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERTAG FROM v_USERROLEDETAIL t1 ) t1
